## Biography

Hello everyone! I am Bo Li, a bioinformatician and associated professor in Chongqing Normal University of China. Before coming to Chongqing, I was a teacher at Wuhan Bioengineering Institute, mainly teaching molecular biology and cell biology.

## Education

**Chongqing University** | Chongqing, China

Ph.D. in Bioinformatics | September 2013 - June 2017

**Chongqing University** | Chongqing, China

M.S. in Biophysics | September 2010 - May 2013

**Northwest A&F University** | Yangling, Shaanxi, China

B.S. in Bioengineering | September 1999 - July 2003

## Experience
